Package com.contentbeach.jna.input.keyboard

Provides the classes that utilize JNA to send keyboard events to applications running on a Windows platform.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KeyboardSendInputHelper
    Use to send text input to a Windows application window.
    ScanCodeHelper
    Provides methods to retrieve scan codes from ScanCode for specific text characters.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoSuchWindowException
    Throw when a window cannot be found for a given window title.

Package com.contentbeach.jna.input.keyboard Description

Provides the classes that utilize JNA to send keyboard events to applications running on a Windows platform.
